column4: anyone here use neotrace? and if so do u know a good similar program for ubuntu / linux
I remember using something years ago that looked similar.  I use mtr nowadays though, I don't have a need for location or map plotting.  Let me see if I can find the other package I used though.
You could either a) try to run neotrace in Wine, b) Try http://geotrace.sourceforge.net/ c) use something like this http://www.cucy.net/map/georoute.html
